name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: I love skirts and am always on the lookout for nice ones.  I first bought one of these a year ago and was very pleased with the skirt.  It’s a nice light weight, but not sheer, making them drape nicely and flowy.  I now own three of them and excited to for nicer weather to wear them.  I like quality clothing but think it’s unnecessary to spend a lot of money, I’m not a ‘label’ person.  I like to wear them longer so place the waistband just below my waist, comfortable for me.  I’ve not noticed any defects or bad sewing on any of them.  Love the pockets!  I don’t think you’ll be disappointed.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 March 2024

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: This is a lovely skirt.  There is non-functional tie sewed to the front center which I removed and kept as a hair tie.  Light and breezy it is a great addition to my summer wardrobe. It will be great to wear as a bathing suit cover-up. The skirt is unlined and maybe slightly see-through in direct sunlight.  I wear a slip with it.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 June 2020

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: The material is very soft and although it's thin and lightweight it's not sheer. It fits as expected and has an elastic waist. Very comfortable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 July 2022

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: This skirt is really cute!! I’m so pleasantly surprised that everything about it I love. The colors are really vibrant even after a hand wash cycle (hung dry). It still felt soft after the wash and it wasn’t so wrinkly that you couldn’t wear it. I steamed mine a little to see if there was a different look (really didn’t make a huge difference). Also I’m 5’6 and it didn’t shrink. There is a lot of stretch in the elastic band that I kinda think I could had gotten a small instead of the medium. However the strings are functional so I kept the medium.Some of the reviews mentioned a mermaid fit. I really didn’t think there was a huge mermaid fit (my opinion but could be my body type). In the one picture I have you can see that I stretched my legs out and it didn’t cut into my legs. There’s only a hint of that mermaid fit and it’s right at the first ruffle. This skirt is really flowy. It moves with your body. I didn’t think it was see through and I was standing in the sunlight in one of those pictures. The fabric is really light weight that it can be worn in the spring and summer which I’ll be doing since I live in the south. I’m going to buy another one!I
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 May 2019

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: I understand now what some of the other customers complained about -- while the material was nice and the pattern is quite beautiful, the fit is absolutely nothing like the description and picture.  In the picture the skirt flows freely and in the description it is supposed to be relaxed and a-line, but in reality it is exactly what other people are describing: a kind of modified "mermaid-style" in that it is fitted closely at the thighs at the first ruffle line.  It feels kind of awkward and it certainly doesn't flow.  I was really disappointed because I liked the material and pattern.To be more specific, I'm a 30-inch waist and normally a "small" by American standards (size 6).
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 April 2019

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets

For reference, if I pull it to one side there is about 4" of fabric.  It's very thin and a bit sheer.  There is a weird seam across the middle of the thigh that makes it tighter there.  For $9.99 I'll still wear it, but it's not the flowy , boho skirt that is pictured.

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: Let’s work this out together, Amazon friends...I ordered an XL in the color “purple”. I am a curvy size 14 in most jeans. I wear L in most leggings. I carry my bulk in my hips and rear.The colors:As you can see in my image the skirt I received is different from not only the skirt pictured in another review but also different from the one pictured by the seller. The skirt I received is pink in the background and blue where there should be purple. Nice colors, sure. But not the colors I ordered, you dig?The fit:Truthfully it fits as it should, flowy and pretty. It’s not snug for me. BUT it’s not wearable because the pockets are not deep and don’t hang properly so they stick out. Making your hips appear larger. I don’t need that in my life.Also my skirt has a little ruffle sewn in where the top hem meets the bottom hem of the dress and it’s sewn upsidedown. An upsidedown ruffle. Just looks odd. So odd.  I already wear enough odd stuff. I wanted this to be one of my “nice” pieces of clothing!In short - purchase if you’re into living dangerously and are cool w getting random things sent to you! I’m sending mine back. ✌️
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2019

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: I wanted to try the new trend of a graphic tee and flowy skirt with out breaking the bank and this skirt is perfect.  But if you're in between sizes size up.  I wear a 24 in pants and I was worried the smallest size would be too big but when I first put it on it was actually a little tight.  it's a great skirt and goes with a ton of my graphic tees.

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: I'm a skeptical buyer of clothes on Amazon, particularly since I do not normally like the quality of things that come from China.  However, I needed a red skirt for an event in April and didn't want to spend very much.  I'm actually very happy with this skirt and will definitely wear it more than the one time I planned.  It is a little thin, so warmer weather is a must.  It is not see-through at all, though.  It is very pretty and not too long on me.  The fit is very flattering and it's easy to wear almost any kind of top with it, tucked or untucked - both ways work well.  I would say it runs a bit smaller than what the size chart says.  I ordered a medium, but if I would have gotten my actual size, it would have been a small.  I could not imagine a small working very well for this skirt, however.  For reference, I am 5'9" , 140 pounds.  I normally wear a 4 or 6, but in this skirt I wear the 8-10 (M).  I like this enough that I'm going to order another one!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2024

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: Let’s work this out together, Amazon friends...I ordered an XL in the color “purple”. I am a curvy size 14 in most jeans. I wear L in most leggings. I carry my bulk in my hips and rear.The colors:As you can see in my image the skirt I received is different from not only the skirt pictured in another review but also different from the one pictured by the seller. The skirt I received is pink in the background and blue where there should be purple. Nice colors, sure. But not the colors I ordered, you dig?The fit:Truthfully it fits as it should, flowy and pretty. It’s not snug for me. BUT it’s not wearable because the pockets are not deep and don’t hang properly so they stick out. Making your hips appear larger. I don’t need that in my life.Also my skirt has a little ruffle sewn in where the top hem meets the bottom hem of the dress and it’s sewn upsidedown. An upsidedown ruffle. Just looks odd. So odd.  I already wear enough odd stuff. I wanted this to be one of my “nice” pieces of clothing!In short - purchase if you’re into living dangerously and are cool w getting random things sent to you! I’m sending mine back. ✌️
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2019

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: I wanted to try the new trend of a graphic tee and flowy skirt with out breaking the bank and this skirt is perfect.  But if you're in between sizes size up.  I wear a 24 in pants and I was worried the smallest size would be too big but when I first put it on it was actually a little tight.  it's a great skirt and goes with a ton of my graphic tees.

It's fun to wear!

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 May 2019

name: ZESICA Women's 2023 Bohemian Floral Printed Elastic Waist A Line Maxi Skirt with Pockets
reviews: I'm a skeptical buyer of clothes on Amazon, particularly since I do not normally like the quality of things that come from China.  However, I needed a red skirt for an event in April and didn't want to spend very much.  I'm actually very happy with this skirt and will definitely wear it more than the one time I planned.  It is a little thin, so warmer weather is a must.  It is not see-through at all, though.  It is very pretty and not too long on me.  The fit is very flattering and it's easy to wear almost any kind of top with it, tucked or untucked - both ways work well.  I would say it runs a bit smaller than what the size chart says.  I ordered a medium, but if I would have gotten my actual size, it would have been a small.  I could not imagine a small working very well for this skirt, however.  For reference, I am 5'9" , 140 pounds.  I normally wear a 4 or 6, but in this skirt I wear the 8-10 (M).  I like this enough that I'm going to order another one!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2024
